member.name: T:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule
member.summary: Represents a single cursor-based enemy detection rule.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule.#ctor(NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Copy constructor for cloning rules.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this rule is enabled.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-friendly name for this rule.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets the key to spam when enemies are detected.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule.SpamDelayMs
member.summary: Gets or sets the delay in milliseconds between key presses.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule.DetectionRadiusPixels
member.summary: Gets or sets the detection radius around the cursor in screen pixels.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule.ShowVisualRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to draw the detection radius around the cursor.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule.CanSpamKey
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether enough time has passed to allow another key press.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule.MarkKeyPressed
member.summary: Marks that a key was just pressed, resetting the spam timer.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.CursorRule.CreateDefault
member.summary: Creates a default rule setup for testing.

member.name: T:NearestEnemyHighlight.MouseCompatibilityHelper
member.summary: Mouse cursor operations service for GameHelper plugins. Provides safe mouse cursor control using Win32 APIs.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.MouseCompatibilityHelper.SnapCursorTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Snaps the mouse cursor to the specified screen coordinates. Includes safety checks for controller mode and process validation.
member.returns: True if cursor was moved successfully.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.MouseCompatibilityHelper.GetCursorPosition
member.summary: Gets the current mouse cursor position.
member.returns: Current cursor position, or zero if failed.

member.name: T:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore
member.summary: Nearest Enemy Highlight plugin that draws a circle around the closest enemy.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore.LoadSettings
member.summary: Loads settings from file if it exists.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore.IsGameRunning
member.summary: Checks if the game is running and player exists.
member.returns: True if game is running with valid player.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore.FindNearestEnemy
member.summary: Finds the nearest enemy within the search distance.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore.FindEnemiesAroundCursor(System.Single)
member.summary: Finds enemies within the specified radius around the mouse cursor.
member.returns: List of entities within the cursor radius.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore.ExecuteCursorRules
member.summary: Executes all active cursor rules, spamming keys when enemies are detected.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore.DrawCursorRuleRadii
member.summary: Draws visual radius circles around the cursor for enabled rules.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore.DrawCircleAroundEnemy
member.summary: Draws a circle around the nearest enemy on screen.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore.DrawDebugInfo
member.summary: Draws debug information on screen.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore.IsUIActive
member.summary: Checks if the UI is currently active and cursor tracking should be paused.
member.returns: True if UI is active and tracking should pause.

member.name: M:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemyCore.SnapCursorToNearestEnemy
member.summary: Snaps the cursor to the nearest enemy's screen position.

member.name: T:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings
member.summary: Settings for the Nearest Enemy Highlight plugin.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.Enable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the plugin is enabled.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.MaxSearchDistance
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum distance to search for enemies.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.CircleRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the radius of the circle drawn around the nearest enemy.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.CircleThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the circle line.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.CircleColorR
member.summary: Gets or sets the red component of the circle color (0-255).

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.CircleColorG
member.summary: Gets or sets the green component of the circle color (0-255).

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.CircleColorB
member.summary: Gets or sets the blue component of the circle color (0-255).

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.CircleColorA
member.summary: Gets or sets the alpha component of the circle color (0-255).

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.ShowDebugInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show debug information.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.EnableCursorTracking
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cursor tracking is enabled.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.PauseDuringUI
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to pause cursor tracking during UI interactions.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.ToggleHotKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the hotkey for toggling cursor tracking.

member.name: P:NearestEnemyHighlight.NearestEnemySettings.CursorRules
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of cursor-based detection rules.
